text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Phew... I've completed the workout<n>sets. Doing high knees
on the sand is<n>quite exhausting.
choice_data_list: All right. Let's take a ten-minute breather.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Understood.

Biwa Hayahide needs to work on the<n>basics, so we're at
summer camp<n>doing core training on the beach.

We use our perfectly designed<n>training plan to get
consistent results.<n>Everything goes smoothly—that is,<n>until
near the end of the day...

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Pant... Pant... How did I do?

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A's Trainer
text_block_list.text:
Your time's really improved! And<n>you've steadily been
getting faster<n>since camp started. Let's keep up<n>this pace!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text: Oh! Got it! Thank you!

A bright-eyed Umamusume is<n>producing good results
nearby.<n>Hayahide probably can't help but<n>notice her.

While we're doing basic drills, she<n>might get impatient
seeing others<n>making dramatic gains. That's not<n>unusual
when first starting to run<n>races.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hm? Why wouldn't I be? Of course<n>I'm fine. All right, ten
minutes are<n>up—let's get back to training.

With nothing else to say about it, we<n>stick to the plan and
continue her<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
There, we're done for today. All<n>finished and according to
schedule.<n>Perfect.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Thank you. Let's go back to the camp<n>dorms.

Just as I feel like my worries are<n>unfounded when I see her
so calm,<n>she looks over at me.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Oh yes, I was wondering... What are<n>your plans for the
evening?
choice_data_list:
Gulp. Don't tell me you want to add even more
training to the schedule...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hah... You must think I'm a glutton for<n>punishment. You
wouldn't be wrong<n>though.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But I'm simply asking what your<n>plans tonight are. If you're
free,<n>there's somewhere I'd like to take<n>you.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes. I feel like we haven't had a<n>single conversation since
camp<n>started, other than to talk about<n>training.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
It's a little soon, but I want to reflect<n>on our progress. No...
That's not right.<n>I should state my intentions clearly.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: What I mean to say is... I want to go<n>to the festival with you.
Tap, tap, tap... Crack!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Game Operator
text_block_list.text:
Oh, almost had it! But you split the fish<n>tail into pieces. Too
bad! Better luck<n>next time!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Rats... Another failure. Theoretically, I<n>should be able to cut
an impeccable<n>shape if I take the weakness of the<n>
grooves into account...
Hayahide has brought me to a<n>summer festival near camp.

Having enjoyed a stroll around the<n>attractions, we're now
trying our hand<n>at the candy-cutting game.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I sharpened the toothpick. I've also<n>made preparations to
counter<n>particulate accumulation. Everything<n>was perfect...
But why? Did I<n>miscalculate the applied force?
choice_data_list: I think you're leaning your shoulder in too hard.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Yes... It appears so. My calculations<n>were accurate, but
putting them into<n>effect made me flustered, thus<n>leading to
a bad outcome.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
So, however flawless the formula, if I<n>can't match it with my
abilities, it's no<n>more than a useless string of random<n>
numbers.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
If an individual has innate talent and<n>dedication... My sister,
for<n>example—she'd be able to prove the<n>formula without
difficulty.

Saying this, her eyes wander<n>upwards to the sea of stars<n>
shimmering in the night sky.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I'm sure Brian won't choose another<n>path. However hard it
is, she'll train<n>those amazing legs she was born<n>with...
and go to the top.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
But it's different for me. I have to<n>calculate the shortest
route, remove<n>obstacles, and adjust my running<n>just to
make it to the starting line.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And yet... it's fine that way. That's<n>simply who I am.

I see no resignation in her smile—only<n>the radiance of
someone who<n>confronted and accepted herself.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
I was nothing special before—always<n>scrambling to gain a
footing. But I<n>found my talent, developed it, and<n>became
the person I am now.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: And you accepted me for exactly who<n>I am.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That's why it's fine. Even if I don't<n>get there as fast as I'd
like, I'll move<n>boldly forward and trust in my ability.<n>That's
my path.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
In other words, I wanted to say<n>there's no need to worry.
Every day<n>I'm growing in both mind and body.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
That's all. And now, to use a strategy<n>certain to obliterate
this candy-cutting<n>game. I can already see victory!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I'll get it this time!
After a few more attempts...
Tap, tap, tap... Snap!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Ah! I did it!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: I did it! Look, I cut it out beautifully!

text_block_list.name: Game Operator
text_block_list.text:
That's mighty impressive! This is the<n>best cut I've ever
seen! You showed<n>real tenacity! What a win!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Hehe, indeed. I make an art out of<n>persevering until I've
reached the<n>perfect solution.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Right, Trainer? Heheh.

The festive night becomes a<n>wonderful memory. And with
our<n>minds and bodies refreshed, the final<n>day of summer
camp arrives.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Hup... Haaah!

As I check Biwa Hayahide's time to<n>see how she's
improved, I can barely<n>recognize her running...

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
How was it? That should be my<n>maximum output. Did we
reach our<n>goal?

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text: Good!

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
Going through the fundamentals led<n>to success. This
method really does<n>suit me.

text_block_list.name: Biwa Hayahide
text_block_list.text:
An equation for growth that leads to<n>victory... And I
discovered it with you.

She looks out over the expansive<n>horizon. But no matter
how far she<n>sets her aim, I know she'll reach it.
And together—we will complete the<n>winning equation!
